d4814869-f11e-4393-9675-9db571e8efce: {n}Wenduag wipes away the black streaks left by her tears.{/n} "I'm feeling better, {mf|master|mistress}. My mind is clear."
b3e3abd0-682f-4557-8d81-265cecbfc10b: {n}Wenduag's body stiffens slightly.{/n} "You felt like it? You killed her, a potential ally, just for fun? I appreciate cruelty and violence in a leader, but this is just gore for the sake of it. I'll hope you don't choke me to death in bed one of these days just because you feel like it."
3c3d5a3e-8d77-48cf-9258-78b4d2dc0873: {n}Wenduag's clothes are tattered and torn in places, and there is a fresh scratch on her cheek and bloodstains on her hands that she seems to have tried to wash off. But her face is alight with happiness, and a wild gleam dances in her eyes.{/n} "{mf|Master|Mistress}! I have no excuse! I went off to Alushinyrra on my own and it was... so much fun! I lost track of time, and when I came to my senses, I rushed back here immediately!"
3ce3400d-2caa-4b38-9371-41af60cb5e94: {n}Wenduag's expression is grim and intent as she holds your gaze, but then says smoothly,{/n} "As you wish, {mf|master|mistress}. I would hate to bother you with my troubles."
7ef5cf62-8ad5-4447-921e-01cfcbcb14ec: {n}Wenduag's expression is nonchalant, but her eyes narrow briefly, burning with predatory greed.{/n}
73632043-4210-4676-9397-b36f79b4197b: {n}Wenduag's expression seems to freeze, and she turns away.{/n} "Well, I won't beg. But I think you'll regret this soon. You won't find an uplander that can compare to me."
d36b771a-ec78-440f-b60f-46f49a1b3391: {n}Wenduag's eyes drift half-closed and she arrogantly pronounces,{/n} "He was never my equal. I'm surprised that some people thought he could be chief after Sull. I'm the only one worthy of being chief."
fc737e9f-7caa-458b-bd7e-59df9b1fd81f: {n}Wenduag's eyes narrow to slits and her face breaks into a satisfied smile.{/n} "This is true, {mf|master|mistress}. We've taken so much from the demons already, and we can take much, much more. All their power, all their might... We can conquer everything they possess. Why serve them when we can rob and slaughter them instead?"
2b0e3306-6ecf-4128-a0dd-006970f66ef1: {n}Wenduag's eyes narrow wearily.{/n} "Everything is strange here. But it's all right, {mf|master|mistress}, we'll put things right, won't we?"
d5c99538-eda0-480f-b52d-998be66db42a: {n}Wenduag's eyes shine with admiration.{/n} "This is why I follow you, {mf|master|mistress}. So formidable, so invincible... All right, are there any other idiots who want to provoke the wrath of our {mf|master|mistress}?" {n}Wenduag glares at her tribe, and then nods in satisfaction.{/n} "Good. That's better."
09b9c246-4d18-45c2-948b-39c55c80c2c5: {n}Wenduag's eyes shine with devotion, conviction rings in her voice.{/n}
f6e1b4cd-b42c-4f44-8009-45c03a898cac: {n}Wenduag's face clears and she slowly repeats your words, as if tasting them.{/n} "Decide for myself... Sounds good." {n}The pain and anxiety that gleamed in her eyes are replaced with warmth. Her shoulders straighten, regaining their former unbending pride.{/n}
81ed9137-1b24-4c06-9ee7-e0a67f9cda4c: {n}Wenduag's face freezes, and she is silent for a long time, looking at the corpse lying nearby.{/n} "Yes, {mf|master|mistress}. That is him. My father."
3f8c2eea-47dc-4f3b-9215-12af17218d7d: {n}Wenduag's face is a mixture of horror and desperation. She stares at you helplessly, and tears fill her cat-like eyes. The world around you starts to shake. Is it an earthquake? Or has your body begun to convulse again?{/n}
c04b586a-eea5-4ab8-82ef-f3a32a99e6da: {n}Wenduag's face twists in disappointment, but upon seeing you she summons up an ingratiating smile.{/n} "I knew you would come for me, {mf|master|mistress}, even when I was held captive by those illusions."
2c791ce7-0891-4052-93bd-dee531b0deb8: {n}Wenduag's fingers carefully brush over the fresh bruises on her wrists.{/n} "I love it when I have marks on my body after sex. The ache reminds me of the moments when you gave them to me. So, do you still want to know why I killed those two in the tavern?"
0c887e22-2c09-4949-b46c-1cac602873d1: {n}Wenduag's laughter sounds sincere and utterly carefree, as if she were not speaking about killing her old friend and fellow tribesman.{/n}
83722d94-cb9c-49f9-9ca2-2ad46ecb5abb: {n}Wenduag's laughter sounds sincere... but not entirely. For an instant, her smile looks more like a wince of sadness.{/n}
a13948e4-4c24-426c-927d-253743082d1f: {n}Wenduag's lip curls in contempt.{/n} "My {mf|master|mistress} is a demon worthy of my worship. {mf|He|She} will grant me power you couldn't even dream of. You are nothing but an obstacle in my way."
62461aee-4eb9-4309-99d2-7203496279eb: {n}Wenduag's lips twist into a cruel smile.{/n} "You made so many mistakes, {mf|master|mistress}. Such negligence... Oh, you were practically begging me to stab you in the back and take your place. How could I resist such temptation?"
464ac067-9b29-40b2-9115-1965dff6fbe1: {n}Wenduag's posture becomes proud, even haughty.{/n} "Oh yes, {mf|master|mistress}. My father was chief of Neathholm, and his blood in my veins gave me strength and will. In times of hardship, neathers must be led by a powerful, cunning, and merciless chief — do you know anyone better suited to the role?"
b00ffba8-8d33-4c1a-802e-ab291b735271: {n}Wenduag's reaction is lightning-fast: slamming into him like a whirlwind, she makes her opponent drop to the ground with a series of ruthless blows.{/n}
83880766-161b-46cf-8e5c-52d288e8b223: {n}Wenduag's smile grows crueler, more ruthless.{/n} "You're lyyying," {n}she says in a sing-song voice.{/n} "I can see you're lying. I'll cut you with my flaying knife right here, you'll tell us everything..."
e0844edc-abbe-4e6c-9bb7-82a2e5cf4b8b: {n}Wenduag's smile turns secretive, her voice softening into a low purr.{/n} "You'll find out after everyone else leaves."
aba4c7db-3c32-4c78-be2f-edbdebe994ee: {n}Wenduag's tense stance reveals her constant vigilance. Her eyes are focused and resolute. Noticing you, she lets you speak first, bowing respectfully.{/n} "{mf|Master|Mistress}, I am at your service."
4a5f1c3f-3fff-45ad-a6d3-66ddbc403a66: {n}Wenduag's voice becomes obsequious and sweet as honey.{/n} "Yes, my lord! But I do not dream of a slave's collar, I dream of so much more! Let me be the first of your servants! Let me lead your army — my people — to a victory over your enemies! I see that only your patronage will give us power, only with our creator will the neathers thrive! Grant me your affection, and I, the strongest daughter of the tribe, will not let you down!"
7176791d-2b6a-43b2-bae9-e6283c2b915b: {n}Wenduag's voice gains a fervent edge:{/n} "Why would I betray you, {mf|master|mistress}? You are the strongest! It would be stupid to defect to your enemies and die along with them! No, I am not that dumb!"
ef589ef4-9ec3-43ca-9510-67ecf2cbc3a2: {n}Wenduag's voice is anxious and concerned. She glares at the book in your hands.{/n}
d889bdcf-6f80-4d0a-8dac-5c35a945e218: {n}Wenduag's voice is filled with confusion.{/n} "What's wrong with it? We don't use blades, it's just for fun..." {n}Wenduag looks at you, frowning in suspicious.{/n}
a35e51c8-2c1f-4cc6-8146-27471bfbd55c: {n}Wenduag's voice is ice-cold and furious.{/n} "I don't give a damn about our ways. You may only talk when I allow it now. Remember, Sull, you are trying my patience. Although your experience is useful for managing the tribe, I won't hesitate to rip your fat heart out if I even suspect that you're defying my authority."
24a3c2da-becf-442a-a426-722b7dce1cc4: {n}Wenduag's voice seethes with anger.{/n} "Listen to me, my kin! Yes, the blood that runs through our veins is cursed. It may frighten you, but this is our blood, the blood of our ancestors! This is who we are! And if you cowards have decided to hide in some hole because you're scared... Well, you have a lot more in common with the uplanders than you do with demons!"
0adf79d3-6595-4e0d-8997-63fe07e69f67: {n}Wenduag's voice takes on a low, silken tone.{/n} "We are a tribe. We are on our own. No one is our friend. The neathers only have one ally — their power. It gives us life, it gives us prosperity and a future. And if someone stands in our way, what awaits them?"
86309bc5-f0bb-4957-8b57-ddf14bed6e89: {n}Wenduag's voice trembles, and you recall another conversation with her, back in the tavern in the slums of Alushinyrra. She let her guard down then too... She is actually very fragile, this young woman clinging to her image as a cynical and hardened fighter. If she hears even a hint of condescension in your next words, she'll decide that she looks weak and she will loathe both you and herself in equal measure.{/n}
fa030c53-5eaa-41bd-a5da-1bfcc6ad566c: {n}Wenduag's words rouse the mongrels into action. The underground crusaders hang on her every word, and you watch as a bunch of broken, frightened vagabonds transform into a pack of raging, hungry predators. A bloodthirsty light shines in their eyes, and when Wenduag finishes her speech, they explode in a frenzy of savage howls and ferocious battle cries. The mongrels are no longer cowering and afraid. They are ready to fight for their future.{/n}
29254db1-e431-4daa-96ed-5f673cf61b4a: {n}When Savamelekh notices you, he heaves a sigh of irritation.{/n} "Oh, it's the invincible commander and {mf|his|her} despicable minions. Congratulations. You made it out of Alushinyrra alive, only to die here. But before you meet your end, you will bear witness to a ritual. It will be my crowning achievement — the culmination of all my long years of hard work."
f1fe7560-6e07-42ce-907b-83a9d21b5c3a: {n}When you touch her, she flinches, but then she immediately relaxes and says in a velvety growl,{/n} "Your hands are much gentler than mine... It almost doesn't hurt. Keep going."
7716f017-e6ae-47b4-b562-7bfcf0b28268: {n}Whistling a jaunty tune, Wenduag stares dead ahead, her eyes cold and clear.{/n} "So, this is where it all ends. When I first crossed paths with you in Neathholm, I never thought I'd end up in the very heart of the Worldwound. You certainly know how to enjoy yourself!"
71d51bf1-a235-42cb-a7da-630d54e48c07: {n}Wincing, Wenduag gives you a heavy look.{/n} "Then I'll deal with it myself, without anyone's help. Servants serve their masters, after all, not the other way around. I can't go burdening my {mf|master|mistress} with my problems, right?" {n}She hastily turns away, twisting her lips in a pained, bitter grin.{/n} "Forgive me, {mf|master|mistress}, I've started to forget my place. I think you had better find someone else to sleep with, and I need to get my head straight."
4febe843-143b-4468-96f4-595d0bfe3958: {n}With a coy smile, Wenduag says humbly,{/n} "I may have neglected to mention a couple of cocky demons whose throats I cut, but... What are you implying, {mf|master|mistress}?"
1f5ab2c5-bc06-4ce2-9882-ce90dcf149a5: {n}With a discontented snort, Wenduag turns away.{/n} "As you wish. I've already grown tired of this piece of junk. It's badly balanced, and the blade is dull."
bd0a60cb-e802-4106-b0c2-39234fac7390: {n}With a feral grin, Wenduag bows her head.{/n} "As you wish... But know that I will not forget this. By exiling me, you spit on my pride."
daf609c0-9107-400e-99e5-af535145b228: {n}With a frown, Irabeth lays her hand on her weapon.{/n} "I am waiting for your orders, Commander. Just say the word and we'll settle this. My fists are itching to teach a lesson to that... ruffian."
0b41d953-7938-468a-835b-bb9535f50569: {n}With a frown, Wenduag replies in a dull voice,{/n} "A hunter must be respected. A hunter fights so the tribe can survive. A hunter dies first, so the tribe can live on. Those uplanders aren't my tribe, and if they despise me and laugh at me, why should I fight for their lives? Why should I die? If only I'd known that for my blood I'd get paid in mockery, I would have thought twice before leaving the caves." {n}Now you can clearly tell that Wenduag is deeply insulted.{/n}
421300f7-b296-49a2-8a9d-745776374b2c: {n}With a grim nod, Irabeth replies dryly,{/n} "I will carry out your sentence, Commander. Warriors, move in."
d0359585-b5bd-46c3-928e-824d5f7cc25f: {n}With a helpless look at you, Wenduag slowly kneels and lowers her head, assuming the same pose of submission you saw her warriors do a few moments before.{/n}
a12b9cd8-45be-4462-ace2-0f91862495bf: {n}With a malevolent glare, Wenduag looks Dyra in the face and makes a throat-cutting gesture with her finger.{/n}
1187006f-2344-4786-8ad2-0b4eac352867: {n}With a pained groan, Wenduag gets up from the blood-drenched floor. She looks stunned, with a low growl still rumbling in her throat, but the madness that made her lose herself has subsided.{/n} "What... What happened? {mf|Master|Mistress}, I didn't know what I was doing... It's all just a haze."
c3576eeb-935a-47cb-9f3c-576f54637546: {n}With a playful snarl, Wenduag dodges out of your reach.{/n} "What for? They're just scratches. My body heals everything, just like a cave lizard does. You don't actually think I care about a few scrapes, do you?"
51ba5a04-7988-41b1-90fb-2281f850af2f: {n}With a satisfied grin, Wenduag almost sings in a sweet voice:{/n} "It's not for you lackeys to judge my actions. The Commander is wise, {mf|he|she} will decide a fitting punishment for me. Something tells me my exciting evening isn't over yet!"
60eacd6b-506b-4048-be58-8ec6b59b8063: {n}With a scoff, Wenduag bows before you.{/n} "Forgive me, {mf|master|mistress}. I didn't want to make you angry. I suppose I should leave."
f8246f73-d854-4cf0-a9a5-696456b7c58a: {n}With a skeptical grimace, Wenduag snaps resentfully,{/n} "What a wonderful future — spreading my legs and pushing out squealing spawn. That's exactly what I've dreamed of my whole life."
41e76fec-86d6-4722-9e6e-00055d6b8115: {n}With a sob, Wenduag hastily wipes her tears. She looks at you with suspicion and jealousy — the same look you saw that time at Vellexia's. {/n} "I must look like a snotty messy now... How disgusting." {n}You hear an odd note of vulnerability in Wenduag's voice. No matter how tough she usually is, right now a single harsh word could break her.{/n}
cd12561a-cf1a-4ae3-8c73-84fdae486f87: {n}With a stony face, Wenduag bows respectfully.{/n} "As you wish, {mf|master|mistress}."
73a181f5-6771-4825-ab18-cef89b458e3c: {n}With a sudden smile, Wenduag nods.{/n} "Of course I did. Can you imagine the reward Savamelekh would give me for your death? Too bad I couldn't deceive you, but... I'll get to you... one day." {n}Twisting an unfamiliar gold ring on her finger, Wenduag disappears.{/n}
e48d31b9-0db5-46b7-9579-b2c5386938bb: {n}With a wistful scoff, Wenduag looks at you with unconcealed surprise.{/n}
b7c21e2b-de01-4be3-ae1f-8d27ae61cec5: {n}With an enigmatic smile, the huntress stares at Savamelekh's corpse.{/n} "Can we talk in private? My words are for your ears only."
742568b4-bf51-4405-9920-78fc10932298: {n}With an excited chuckle, the huntress says,{/n} "I will tell you if I sense he is near. I was the best hunter in my tribe, after all, and while finding one demon in a city full of demons is a difficult task, I can do it."
ed794ac6-dbac-4879-aee3-ed027e5209e4: {n}With an irritated scoff, Wenduag gives you a reluctant.{/n} "Fine, but you don't need to patronize me. I don't need anyone's protection! If you don't like something, just say, 'Wenduag, I forbid it,' and I'll do as you command."
6acbdc25-9686-4d3c-be68-cad1d6f91c3c: {n}With an irritated sniff, Wenduag says intensely,{/n} "You uplanders just love asking questions. Come with me and see for yourself."
58ef6366-6f73-459d-83d0-3e22c71a5250: {n}With breathtaking earnestness, Wenduag drops to her knees and cries out,{/n} "Glory to mighty Savamelekh! Glory to the creator! I will do everything you ask. Now I must return to the party of that disgusting filth, but your words will sound in my ears!"
b4e95351-a20f-4297-854d-141af1950f87: {n}With soft eyes and a softer smile, Wenduag carefully runs her claws down your shoulders. Gone is the painful passion, but now there's something else in her touch, something new. Trust, acceptance, and warmth.{/n} "I want you, but not like I did before. I don't want to play with power, pain, and helplessness today." {n}Her whisper teases you, and her nimble fingers confidently remove your clothes.{/n} "This time, you will be mine, and I will be yours. For real..."
b4bff5f7-e0c6-44ac-8ae0-64e788fa171e: {n}Without a trace of shame, Wenduag takes off her clothes and you see a bad wound on her side.{/n} "This is a little something Savamelekh's warriors gave me. Seems there was some kind of poison on their claws. The wound needs to be cleaned, but I can't even touch it — as soon as I do I start howling with pain. I... need your help. Damn it! This is so humiliating, I feel so helpless!"
3ab30d35-622d-47ec-a144-3ba50182f479: {n}You are so close you can feel the feverish heat coming from her body. Wenduag bows her head, revealing her defenseless neck, and you smell her — an animistic, spicy mixture of sweat and lust. Slowly and gracefully, she lowers herself to her knees before you.{/n} "Good. Now I believe you."
fb2ccbcc-ba5f-4031-9a93-1c79d6030f8b: {n}You can hear Irabeth gritting her teeth in the silence that follows your words.{/n}
96948c93-0d70-49bc-bdd4-f5924df551c3: {n}You can hear the mockery in Wenduag's voice. Her words drip with disdain.{/n} "Oh, little Lann, you're here too? Sorry, I didn't notice you at first. I was too busy killing the ancient demon who was responsible for creating our tribe. What are you doing here?"
4ed459a3-064a-485b-9e7b-b4cb291e0811: {n}You feel as though your chest is bound by invisible chains that are growing tighter and tighter by the second. You find yourself gasping for air, trying to breathe, but it's no use. The world around you grows dimmer with each heartbeat. This is it...{/n}
b7a0b3ef-3ffe-4ec9-8d5e-db309985b054: {n}You hear a hint of mulish arrogance in Wenduag's weary voice.{/n} "You didn't doubt me, did you, {mf|master|mistress}?"
d28b0f44-d46c-412f-9aca-024328d5de10: {n}You hear confusion in the huntress's voice.{/n} "I just didn't know what else to do... I remembered uplanders saying something about how a kiss could break a spell..." {n}Wenduag glances over at you in sudden horror.{/n} "That's all a load of rubbish, isn't it? Gods, what a fool I've been..."
7302eabc-01da-45be-8d52-3d48caf167fe: {n}You hear dull irritation in Wenduag's voice.{/n} "Maybe we will but... I've completely lost control of the situation, you know? We — my tribe and I — are just pawns in a game being played by greater forces. Understanding the designs of the players is beyond our capabilities. The players being demon lords, deities, and... you."
e5153897-a7fc-4204-88e1-0722192e92a6: {n}You hear slight irritation in Wenduag's voice, and the glance she casts at the book is full of poorly concealed desire.{/n}
afe1996d-880c-45c1-99ea-f347d0bb8273: {n}You notice that Wenduag is standing beside the demons. She calls out mockingly,{/n} "Didn't expect to see me again, did you? But I've been dreaming of this day for a long time. I have a new master now — the great Savamelekh. Now I finally have the chance to kill you, and prove my worth to him!"
608e9ad0-5d11-4f5e-bb25-f7d7d96909ef: {n}You notice the handle of a dagger sticking out of the huntress's boot — it's the same dagger she took from the One-Eyed Devil back in Drezen. Odd... she's never carried it around with her before. She has better weapons now, weapons that are far more suitable for a serious fight... unless she simply wants to slit someone's veins.{/n}
63f2053b-442f-416d-9828-6303ae784a14: {n}You notice the nearby tradeswoman and Lann exchange secretive looks.{/n}
1539bd39-e619-481a-8094-2a81dd1dbb49: {n}You realize that behind the angry words and the vicious gleam in her eyes, Wenduag is icily calm.{/n}
f25164d9-ac9d-4767-abff-153aa789437c: {n}You recall two moments when Wenduag opened up to you — during the night of drinking in the tavern in Alushinyrra, when she got intoxicated and let her guard down, and at the reception at Vellexia's when she was blinded by jealousy and openly showed her vulnerability. {/n}
44e17121-959b-4b54-902a-060a34031feb: {n}You see fresh crimson cuts and abrasions on her elbows and chin, some of them look quite deep and were hastily pulled together with crude stitches. Over time, they will turn white and become the newest addition to the landscape of scars on the fighter's lithe body.{/n}
0a150c90-8be6-469e-86ab-320bf6101763: {n}You see the apprehension behind her sweet smile. Her bristling fur and tail whipping back and forth are dead giveaways.{/n}
757b5128-dfc7-4a11-b024-da3e371571f2: {n}You see the tension behind her nonchalant smirk, and you realize her disheveled appearance is but an elaborate masquerade.{/n}
9b6b5e6c-ff3d-4482-a5c9-28183250c0f9: {n}Your anger makes Wenduag cringe fearfully, but there is something artificial in her tremulous tone.{/n}
c7a96f14-3387-45ea-9d92-7dc50341d592: {n}Your hands carefully place the potion-soaked sponge over the wound. With a howl like a wounded animal, Wenduag bolts upright and hits you in the face — not a slap, but a full-on punch.{/n}
1cd03424-db0e-4243-a56e-df94027f5e7a: {n}Your servant seeks to betray you? You feel seething rage rise from somewhere deep within you and lodge in your throat, as if trying to choke you.{/n}
1533162f-dbd0-4542-b696-4b9d27d43313: {n}Your words go unheeded by Wenduag, who drops to her knees before Savamelekh.{/n} "Master..."
d5db6281-76d0-4666-adcd-83aae46d6af8: {n}Your words hit her a bucket of ice-cold water. Wenduag freezes and the wild fire in her eyes goes out.{/n} "Forgive me, {mf|master|mistress}, that was unacceptable. I was worked up and I got carried away. I thank you for reminding me of my place. It will never happen again."
aacfeb87-9117-4928-8aeb-776a165a7740: {n}{g|Dyra}Dyra{/g} looks at you warily, and at Wenduag — with unconcealed fear.{/n} "You're back? Shall we trade, then?"
8e6d4df4-d992-4b59-9098-4564f45e0a47: {n}{g|Dyra}Dyra{/g} stares into the sky with a fascinated, slightly frightened look. She is so focused she doesn't notice you until you walk right up close.{/n} "Oh, is it you? Com... Commander?"
